lead_paragraph: The supercar is the rear-drive version of the all-wheel-drive LP 610-4, but there is more fun in the corners with the 580.

headline.print_headline: The Huracán LP 580-2  Is a Rear-Drive Dream
headline.main: Video Review: Lamborghini Huracán LP 580-2 Is a Rear-Drive Dream

snippet: The supercar is the rear-drive version of the all-wheel-drive LP 610-4, but there is more fun in the corners with the 580.
abstract: Driven column review of Lamborghini Huracan LP 580-2.
